entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 20.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 90 near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
